pkgmetadata.longdescription: Power Analysis for Meta-Analysis // A simple and effective tool for computing and visualizing statistical power for meta- analysis, including power analysis of main effects (Jackson Turner, 2017)doi:10.1002/jrsm.1240, test of homogeneity (Pigott, 2012)doi:10.1007/978-1-4614-2278-5, subgroup analysis, and categorical moderator analysis (Hedges Pigott, 2004)doi:10.1037/1082-989X.9.4.426.
